participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: adventurous and sociable, with a hint of self-deprecation when it comes to cooking.
participant_1.background: i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: curious and imaginative, with a strong desire to understand his unique abilities.
participant_2.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body.
